item.title: Amanta Healthcare IPO Day 1 Live: Issue opens today. GMP signals over 22% listing gain

review.headline_rewrite: Amanta Healthcare IPO Day 1 Live: Issue opens today. GMP signals over 22% listing gain
bullets: Amanta Healthcare IPO Day 1 Live: Amanta Healthcare, a pharmaceutical firm focusing on the production of parenteral products, is launching its initial public offering
Amanta Healthcare IPO price band has been set between ₹120 and ₹126 per equity share, with a face value of ₹10.
Amanta Healthcare IPO includes a fresh issuance of 1 crore equity shares.

item.title: BYD profit drop shows even EV leader isn’t safe in price war
